page.title: 06PUPIL INTERVIEW-12yrs(cont)
page.content: hockey,swimming,football and roller skating. The activities out of school for his age group are Judo clubs at the YMCA,ice hockey,youth clubs in North Shields and an aqua club in Cullercoats. He likes Marden High School better than his first school because he feels then facilities are much better.He likes the idea of having different teachers for each lesson,and he thinks that the teachers treat the pupils like adults. He lives in a semi-detached house,with 10 rooms.The house was built in 1939.It has a front and back garden. During the school holidays he usually sleeps in,gets up,and then goes out to swim or play ice-hockey with his friends.
